mapper.insert:
insert into t_tablearea ( areaid, areaNo, areaname, status, custPrinter, areaSort, branchid, modifytime
)values ( #{areaid}, #{areaNo}, #{areaname}, #{status}, #{custPrinter}, #{areaSort}, #{branchid}, now() )
mapper.delete: update t_tablearea set `status` =0, modifytime = now() WHERE areaid =#{id} AND areaid NOT in (SELECT DISTINCT areaid FROM t_table t WHERE t.`status` in(1,3))
mapper.select:
select areaid, areaNo, areaname, status, custPrinter, areaSort, branchid
from t_tablearea where areaid=#{id}

select distinct areaid
from t_table where areaid=#{id} and `status` in(1,3)

select count(*) from t_table
where areaid=#{id}

select distinct areaid,areaname from t_tablearea
and status = 1
order by areaSort

SELECT distinct tt.areaid,tt.areaname,count(t.tableid) 'tableCount' FROM t_tablearea tt LEFT JOIN `t_table` t on t.areaid=tt.areaid where tt.status =1 and (t.`status` is null or t.`status`!=5) GROUP BY tt.areaid order by tt.areaSort asc
